inclusion.criterion: Digital subtraction angiography imaging studies demonstrating occlusion of unilateral ICA or MCA
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Other neurovascular disease (such as cerebral aneurysm or arteriovenous malformation)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known unstable angina or myocardial infarction within recent 6 months
exclusion.label: not_met
